K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389a-1: shr'i badzra ma h'a bhe ra wa n'a ma tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-0: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i @389b rgyud ces bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-1: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khros pa'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-2: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-3: sgrub pa yang dag rab bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-4: de ni lha rnams thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-5: drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-6: de la thog mar sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i gnas la dgod pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-7: de la gnas gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-8: dur khrod dam; chu klung gi 'gram mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-19: grong la sogs pa'i gnas su sngags pa gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-20: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i ming gi rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pas dbang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:389b-38: klu la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dis bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-0: dang por re zhig sngags pas ro bsregs pa'i thal chen gyis lus byugs te mtshan phyed na gcer bu skra bsil ba byas la 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor gyis dur khrod la sogs par dkyil @390a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-2: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-3: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-4: dril bu dar gyi 'phan la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-5: me tog phreng bas rnam par klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-6: gra rnams dag ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-7: sgo khyud kyi ni phug dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-8: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-9: zla ba phyed pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-10: de dbus 'khor lo bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-11: re'u mig dgu pa zlum po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-12: sgo gcig pa ni dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-13: lhag ma yongs su gced par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-14: de dbus mi ro bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-15: shar du mgo bo lhor lag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-16: nub tu rgyu ma byang du rkang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-19: nub byang du dur khrod kyi ra sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-20: byang shar du skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-22: 'khor lo'i dbus su mtshan ma'i phyag rgya lnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-23: de nas 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-24: shar phyogs kyi snam bu la gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-28: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-29: lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-30: lho phyogs kyi snam bu la sta re dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-35: rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-36: nub phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-42: rlung gi ba dan la sogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390a-43: byang phyogs kyi snam bu la sdigs mdzub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-3: me thab la sogs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-4: sgo bzhi dang gra rnams la ro langs chen po bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-5: gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-17: phag pa la sogs pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-28: khyung chen po la sogs pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-29: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-33: dkyil 'khor gyi gra thams cad du khrag gis chag chag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-34: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba la gnas pas lha bshos thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-35: de nas sngags bas sngon du spyad pa byas te bdag zhi bar gyur pa'i shin tu mthun pa'i grogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-36: bdag gcig bu rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus byugs te gcer bur phud nas skra bsil /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-37: mtshan phyed na cang te'u bkrol la ha ha zhes bya zhing mnyam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-38: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub 'dod pas 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:390b-39: rab tu zhim pa'i chad la sogs pa btung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-3: dngos grub ma yin pa la dmigs la de'i steng du dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-4: de'i mdun du g-yas bskum du gnas la nga rgyal dang bcas pas sems rtse gcig tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-5: de nas 'jigs pa chen po byung na; de la sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-7: de la bgegs chen po'i bar chod 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-8: bar chad byung na dngos grub mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-9: de bas na sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-10: de la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dgyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-11: dgyes nas khyod ci 'dod ces gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-12: de la rig 'dzin gyis smra bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-18: de las gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par bdag la stsol cig ces brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-19: de la the tshom med par stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-20: brgya zhig la sngags pas de dag ma grub na yang de'i phra mo'i las thams cad nges par 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-22: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-23: dkyil 'khor bstan ba ste rtog pa dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391a-24: de nas las kyi tshogs kyi cho ga rab tu bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-0: rim pa ji lta ba @391b bzhin du bsad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-1: bskrad pa la sogs pa sngags pa khros pas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-2: dang po kho nar sngags bas re zhig gnod mdzes su bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-4: rnal 'byor gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-5: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas thog mar ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-7: de sbyor ba'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-9: ji ltar bsad par 'dod pa'i sngags pas dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-14: dha du ra'i khu bas rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo le tshe bcu drug pa bya rog chen po'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-15: mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus gcer bu skra bshig pas kha lhor bltas te ma he'i gdong gi sbyor pas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-16: me gnyis kyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par bzhag la de yi ge bcu pas bskor zhing h'um brgyad bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-17: zur rnams su phat kyi yi ge rnams bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-18: bdag nyid tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs la thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor rab tu bcug la sgyed bu gsum gyi steng du bzhag nas dur khrod kyi mgal bas me rab tu spar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-19: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-20: des skad cig gis the tshom med par 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:391b-21: gzhan yang rims kyis thebs par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-0: 'khor lo de nyid mi'i nya phyis gnyis @392a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-1: kyi dbus su legs par bzhag la me thab kyi 'og tu khru phyed brkos la bcug nas me spar na rims nad kyis 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-2: de la le tshe bcu drug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-4: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i sngags dang ldan pa yi ge btu pa'i sngags bsgrub bya'i ming dang lhan cig tu yi ge dang sngags spel lo; ;sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig tu bya rog gis btogs pa'i lhag ma mi gtsang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-5: rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyi ras la byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-6: de la sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'khor lo bris te dur khrod du spas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-7: shing gcig gi drung du spas na bskrad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-8: mtshan ma gcig par spas na dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-9: chu'i nang du spas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-10: khyim du bzhag na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-11: phyung nas legs par bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392a-12: gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi cho gas dur khrod kyi ras la bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-0: dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan tshad sor brgyad pa byas la de'i snying @392b gar 'khor lo'i sngags bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-1: mi'i rus pa'i phur bus gnas lngar gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-2: tshigs thams cad la tsher ma rnon pos dgang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-3: de thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-4: de grog mkhar dang gnas bdun gyi sas gshin rje'i gzugs khru gang tsam zhal gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-10: gcer bu skra bsil ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-11: de'i snying gar thod pa gnyis bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-12: nyi ma phyed dam nam phyed na dur khrod dam ro bsregs pa'i sar spas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-13: shin tu ring par mgo lhor bstan la kha thur du phub la spa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-14: khyim du 'ongs pa dang mnyam par bzhag pas ma he'i gdong gi sbyor bas bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na nyi ma gsum gyis 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-15: phyung nas bkrus na thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-16: de nas rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-17: te'u lo pa'i pags pa la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-18: pags pa de bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-19: gcin btang ba'i shul gyi sas bkang la de'i skras bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-20: phyi nas bong bu'i gcin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-21: rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu brdzis la kham phor dgang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:392b-22: der 'khor lo bcug la ro bsregs pa'i me la bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-0: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la gshin @393a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-1: rje'i sbyor bas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas ba byas na zhag gcig gis rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-3: phyis rjes su gzung ba mi 'grub pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-4: sngags pas shin tu khros pas rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-5: gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-6: gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi cho gas bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-7: gnas bdun gyi sas ma he dang rta byas te; de gnyis gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-8: de gnyis kyi snying gar 'khor lo bcug ste nim pa'i shing drung du bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-9: 'khor lo yang ma he dang rta'i khrag gis bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-10: 'di ni; sngags kyi bye brag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-11: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas byas na zhag gsum gyis 'byed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-12: de nas sngags pas bskrad par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-13: gnas bdun gyi sas rnga mo byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-14: de'i rgyab tu yi ge yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dmigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-15: de'i steng du bsgrub bya dmigs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-16: de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pas dbyug pa 'dzin par dmigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-17: de'i dbyug pas rdeg cing kha lho ru bltas nas khrid par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-18: 'khor lo de de'i snying gar gong du gsungs pa'i cho ga las bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba yang dag par bris la bcug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-19: zhag bdun gyi the tshom med par skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393a-20: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-0: nyi ma'i tshes @393b la gtum po tsha ba'i mar khus byugs la nim pa'i shing la 'dzegs nas der bzhag la de'i lus kyi mar khu nya phyis kyis bzhar la der gnas par gzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-1: mar bu [?] de blangs nas lha chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi ras blangs la de bsregs pa'i bar gyi du ba'i dreg pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-2: mar khu de gcig tu byas la bskrad par 'dod pa de'i mchil lham la bsku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-3: de'i lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis la yang byugs na skad cig gis de skrod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-4: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-6: gro ga'i lo ma la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bya rog gi khrag dang bya rog gi smyu gus bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-7: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang sbel te gtor ma za ba'i mgrin par bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-8: bya rog bzung nas ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bar gnas pas kha lhor bltas la 'phang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-9: de'i skad cig gis bya rog bzhin sa kun tu 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-11: tsha ba'i mar khus bskus la nim pa'i shing las gtor ma za pa'i tshang blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-12: tshang de'i shing pha'i nags kyi shing mes bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs la gang gi mgor blugs pa de skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-13: gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-14: bya rog dang 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-16: gtum po rnams kyi skra gcig tu byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:393b-17: dha du ra'i shing la me rab tu spar te du ba med pa'i mes bsregs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-1: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas nas bud med dang skyes pa gnyis kyi bar du thal ba bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-2: de skad gcig gis 'byed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-3: de nas dur khrod kyi ras blangs la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bran pa'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bris la zer mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-4: sbrul gyi sbu dang pags pa blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-5: de la bcug nas sdong bu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-6: gang gi khyim du spar ba der phan tshun 'thab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-7: de nas bsad par 'dod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-8: bshang gci la gzugs brnyan byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-9: de'i steng du rus ba phye mas rab tu byugs la dur khrod kyi me la skra bshig pa byas la kha lhor bltas te ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bas nam phyed na de gtubs la bsreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-10: gang gi ming dang bcas par byas na de skad cig gis 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-11: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-12: de nas bskrad par 'dod pas rgyal mtshan gyi ras la le tshe bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang dur khrod kyi sol bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-13: nim pa'i shing la rgyal mtshan bzhag na de skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394a-14: de nas rengs par 'dod pas gshin rje'i 'khor lo g-yam pa'am ras la ba bla dang yung bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa legs par bris la bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:394b-0: gal te sngags pas dbang du bya bar 'dod @394b na; grog mkhar gyis dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:398b-30: bcu gcig pa na skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:398b-32: bcu gsum pa na thod tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:398b-34: bco lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:398b-35: bcu drug pa na rlung gis phyar ba'i dur khrod kyi ras; phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:398b-36: zhabs g-yas pa'i dang pos mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-4: zhabs g-yas pas 'di dag la zhon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-5: zhabs g-yon pa'i dang pos bya rgod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-13: zhabs g-yon pas 'di dag mnan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-14: dpal 'jigs byed chen po'i dang po'i zhal ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-19: mnga' bdag gi zhal gsum shin tu khros pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-20: rva g-yon par zhal gsum la dang po dkar po /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-23: rva gnyis kyi bar du dbus kyi zhal dmar po rab tu 'jigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-24: zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-25: steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal cung zad ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-27: byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-28: spyi bor ral pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-29: zhal rnams thams cad spyan gsum par bsgom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-30: 'di ltar bdag nyid rtag tu rtse gcig tu dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399a-31: de nyid dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can de bdag nyid yin par bsgoms nas dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-0: de nas phyi nas @399b sngags bzla bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-1: bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-2: de'i steng du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-4: phyi nas ma yengs pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-5: sbyor ba 'di la gnas pa'i sngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-6: rtag tu 'jigs byed las kun bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-7: dur khrod gnas la bsgom bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-8: rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga rnams bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-9: de yis sgrub las sgrub gzhan med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-10: gzhan yang mar me che za zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-11: mtshan mo rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-12: sum 'bum rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-13: 'di bzlas pa yi sngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-14: thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-17: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-18: sgom pa'i rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-19: de nas dpal 'jigs byed chen pos bstan pa'i bris sku'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-21: ro la bkab pa'i ras sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-22: me tog can gyi ras sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-24: de ma rnyed na ras gang yang rung ba la ri mo mkhan bzang po rnam rtog med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-32: 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-33: de lta bu'i ri mo mkhan gyi lag pas dpa' bo'i ras la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:399b-34: gal te dngos grub 'dod pas dpa' bo'i yon sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-0: gsang ba'i gnas su gnas la shin tu mnyam par @400a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-1: bzhag pas bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-2: ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa pos mthong ba las 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-4: phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-6: gcer bu kha dog nag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-8: 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-9: mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba'i thang ga bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-11: rva'i g-yas su zhal gsum pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-14: ser po shin tu khros pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-18: de gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu dmar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-19: de'i steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-20: phyag g-yas par gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-24: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-36: phyag g-yon pa na thod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400a-46: skyes bu gsal shing gis phug pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-1: phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-10: zhabs g-yon pas bya rgod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-18: 'di lta bur 'dug pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-19: de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po yang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-24: skyes bu mdung rtser btsugs pa'i gzugs de mthong bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-25: n+ya gro dha'i shing ngag gi steng du skyes bu 'phyang ba bri bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-26: skyes bu bsreg bzhin pa yang bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-27: mdung gis phug pa'i skyes bu yang bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-31: lce spyang dag ha ha 'byin pa bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-32: sgrub pa po rnams kyang bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-33: bcom ldan 'das la rtse gcig tu lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-34: gcer bu skra bshig pa; phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-38: thod pas spyi bor brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-39: dgod cing dur khrod der 'jug pa bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-42: gnas gcig tu legs par bzhag la sha chen gyi spos dbul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:400b-43: de'i mdun du dung chen gyi phreng bas bzlas pa bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-0: sngags pa mnyam bar bzhag pas dus gsum du 'bad la bris sku @401a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-2: gzhan gang yang mi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-3: gzhan gang gi mdun du yang mi dgram mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-8: sha chen rtag tu mtshan ma bza'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-9: gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-10: dus gsum du rnam par snang mdzad dang khrag gi spos bris sku'i mdun du dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-12: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba; rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-13: bris sku'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-14: de nas sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-15: ji ltar sngon gyi rim pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-16: dang por re zhig sngags pas pha'i nags su phyin la mtshan phyed na sbyin sreg gi las kun byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-17: gang du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-28: de dag thams cad tsha ba'i mar khus sbrus la ma he'i zhal gyi sbyor bas shin tu mnyam par bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-29: kha lhor bltas te ro bsreg pa'i me la gang gi ming dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401a-30: the tshom med par de zhag gsum gyis 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-0: yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la me thab gru gsum byas nas der @401b sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas kyis gtum po'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-11: rta'i sha dang lhan cig tu gang gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu ba'i sngags kyis dur khrod kyi me la bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-13: yang na dur khrod kyi shing la gtum po'i me rab tu sbar la khyim du gnas te gong gi rdzas de bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang nyi ma bdun gyis 'bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-17: rnga mo'i rtug pa dang lhan cig tu chang dang yang dag par ldan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi shing la me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-18: gcer bu skra bshig par bsgyur nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te gshin rje'i sngags kyis che ge mo'i ming dang bcas par lag ba g-yon pas sbyin sreg stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-19: skrod pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-24: gi wang dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la kha byang du bltas te las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sbyor ba dmigs nas gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-25: de nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-26: de nas grong bskrad par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:401b-27: nim ba'i shing la me rab tu sbar la khyi'i sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-1: byi la'i khrag gcig tu sbrus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-2: gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas grong gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-5: shin tu yang mnyam par bzhag pas bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-6: gzhan du na sngags pa rang nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-7: gzhan gang la yang mi bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-8: de nas bu mo rengs par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-11: ske tshe dang bcas par rang gi khrag gis sbrus nas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags dang bcas pas bu mo rengs par gyur cig ces dur khrod kyi me la sbyin sreg stong byas na rengs pa las gzhan ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-12: de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-16: dur ba dang bcas par pa la sha'i shing la me rab tu sbar na zhi bar 'dod par dmigs nas yul gyi shar phyogs su kha bltas te gnas pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-17: des yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-18: de nas rgyas par 'dod na til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-21: mar dang bcas pas au dum ba ra'i shing la ma rab tu sbar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402a-22: las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lha'i sbyor ba dmigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-0: kha byang du bltas nas mnyam pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong byas na @402b rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-1: de nas dgug par 'dod na ske tshe gzugs brnyan byas la de nas seng ldeng gi me'i dbus su gshin rje'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-2: ma grub pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-3: nyi ma bdun gyis gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'gugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-4: de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-5: bya rgod chen po'i tshang dang sha chen bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-7: de phub ma'i me la bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-9: de nas nor nor ma yin par bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-10: ras bal gyi me la dha du ra'i 'bras bu dang bcas par mtshan mo yi ge bcu pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-11: shin tu chud zos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-13: slar rdzas de nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-14: rje btsun gyi mdun du sha chen chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug tu mtshan mo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-15: yul thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-16: ba lang gi sha dang khrag tu bcas par gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-17: de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran du gnas par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-18: khyi sha rdo rje chu dang bcas par skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis mtshan mo gang gi ming dang bcas pa sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:402b-19: bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-0: rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin @403a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-1: sreg brgya rtsa brgyad gnas gcig tu gnas la mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-2: zhag bdun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-3: glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas mi'i 'jig rten kun la dmigs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-4: zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-5: nya dang sha dang chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-6: bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-8: bya rog gi sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-9: nyi ma bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang rab tu 'bros na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-10: phra mo'i mi lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-11: de nas bya rog gi tshang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-12: 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu dha du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar nas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags gang gi ming dang bcas par nam phyed na sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-13: nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-14: de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403a-15: seng ldeng gi me la til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-0: bud med kyi me tog dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te rnal 'byor gyi gzugs dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs @403b na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-1: nyam bdun gyis dbang du 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-2: de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi 'bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-4: bdud rtsi mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me la gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-5: de skad cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-7: sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-9: sngags pa 'jig rten pas dpyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-10: ji ltar bye brag mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-11: gang la yang bye brag sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-12: bye brag phye na sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-13: ngas rgyud gzhan las kyang bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-14: ji ltar bye brag ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-15: de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-16: rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-17: gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-18: de phyir las rnams mthong mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-19: gzhan dang lhan cig tu mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-20: gal te sngags bas las bya 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-21: de dag gcig pu zhig gis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-22: sngags pa de yis las kun byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-25: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-26: sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-27: de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang dag par gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:403b-28: bsam gtan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba las dgos pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-0: de'i cho ga'i dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong @404a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-1: pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas pas las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-2: re pha las yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar 'bar bar rnam par bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-3: de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-4: bred par gyur pa bdag gi mdun du rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-5: de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i gzugs mang po rnam par spros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-6: khro bo de rnams kyis ral gris btab cing khrag 'thungs par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-7: bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-8: rgyu ma drangs par bsam par bya'o; ;'di skad smra bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-9: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-10: bla ma la skur pa 'debs pa la rgyob cig rgyob cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-11: sod cig sod cig bsams pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'chi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-12: phra mo srog chags gzhan lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-13: de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-14: ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba'i nga rgyal la gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-15: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya du bar bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-16: de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-17: srin po de dag tha dad pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-19: shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404a-20: khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-0: gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams @404b te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-5: khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-6: khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-7: bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas the tshom med par 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-8: dpag tshad brgya na gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-9: sngags pas bsam gtan brtan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-11: ma he'i snying gar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-12: bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying gar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-13: rta dang ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-14: ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-15: phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-16: bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'thab par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-19: de ru yam las yongs su gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-20: yam de'i rgyab tu yam gyi rnam pa las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-21: de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa bred par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-22: ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g-yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa skra bsil ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:404b-23: rnga mo de kha lhor bstan la gtang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-1: ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-2: rnal 'byor pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag bdun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yang skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-3: gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-5: bya rgod kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-6: de'i rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-7: lag pa tho ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i skra bzung ba de la ma he'i gdong can gyis bka' bsgo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-8: kha lho ru bltas nas song bar bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-9: rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba bsam par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-10: rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-11: de nas 'gugs par byed par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-12: yi ge yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-13: de'i steng du aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-14: de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs pa rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-15: ma he'i gdong pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-16: gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo myur bar khug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405a-17: de skad bskul bas yam gyi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-0: bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags pas khams @405b gsum du gsungs [?] ba'i bud med bkug la rol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-1: ji ltar bsam gtan brtan par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-2: 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-3: de nas sbrul gyis zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-4: rang gi snying gar padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-5: de'i steng du dbyangs yig gsum pa 'dab mar phat brgyad rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-7: 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-8: de'i spyi bor yi ge ai kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-9: klu de'i mig rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-10: bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-11: dug khur stong yang za nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-12: de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-13: bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge yam las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-14: de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po ram gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-15: de'i steng du snying gar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:405b-16: de'i steng du dpral bar zla ba'i bdkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-0: @406a *// de'i dbus su yi ge ba mgo thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-2: legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung gis me rab tu spar te; me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-3: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyi bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-4: 'di yi sbyor ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-5: de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-6: 'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-7: zhu bar byed par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-8: de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya ba 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-9: sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyis rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la de nyid mdog dmar por bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-10: bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-11: phyi nas rang gi lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-12: 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsams te 'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-13: bsgrub bya de myos par bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-14: de'i snying gar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par bya'o; ;yang kha dog dmar po sgrub pa pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406a-15: de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-0: bsam gtan 'di'i rab @406b tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-1: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-2: rab tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g-yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-3: rgyud gang la yang mi sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-4: gal te sngags kyang mi bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-5: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-7: sngags kyi dbye ba yang mi bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-8: bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi bkram ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-9: thang ga yang gsang bar gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-10: rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-12: smra ba gzhan su la yang 'ga' tsam yang mi smra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-15: gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-18: de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang mi sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-19: de nas dam tshig mnyam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-20: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-22: dpa' bo bla ma la gus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-28: bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la phyogs pa; rnam par smin pa la 'dzem pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-29: 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:406b-31: dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-1: rje chen pos yid brlan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-2: rnam par rtog pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-3: mchog tu bla ma la gus pa rab tu brtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-4: bla mas de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-5: sngags pas gzhan la byin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-6: de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-9: 'jig rten pha rol tu ni; dmyal bar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-10: dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-13: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-14: bsam gtan gyi las sgrub pa brtag pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-15: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-16: rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-17: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-18: dpal au dyan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-19: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-20: bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal l'a li ta badzras bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-21: bal yul gyi pandi ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa bha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-018:407a-22: bod kyi lotstsha ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o //
